column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Great date night spot- like any night! Ambiance and design of the interior are superb. I think we popped in late on a Wednesday wearing our gym clothes and realized that
column3: it's patrons are on-trend and actually planned to be there
column4: (not typical for old married folks like us during the work week)
column5: so I suggest putting some thought into your attire if you don't want to feel out of place like we did.
